author: foxydeed
content: Dedicated servers in Europe are strategically located in owned Europe data centers or rented racks. Starting at just $19.99 a month, you receive a dedicated (not shared or overselled) server with Intel processor. In addition, we provide a wide range of hardware options (SSD, HDD, RAM, CPU) and their upgrades. Keeping these, dedicated servers offer the most reliable options for maximum performance and flexibility. All dedicated servers are ordered for at least 1 month and can be paid via Bitcoin (BTC) cryptocurrency. https://foxyded.net/ dedicated servers btc
